name: 劉世芸
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
1. orientation;  2. exam format analysis;  3. sentence structure and patterns;  4. commom grammatical mistakes; 5. exam analysis; 6. exam analysis; 7. listening drill; 8. listening drill(cont.)
9. mid-term exam 
10. writing practice; 11. writing practice;  12. listening practice; 13. listening practice; 14. main clauses; 15. main clauses (cont.); 16. exam analysis; 17. exam analysis
18. final exam
scorePolicy:
1. attendance and performance 20% 
2. practice and tests 50%
3. two exams 30%
materials:
1.  GEPT 準備篇: 聽力與閱讀 (東華) 
2.  supplementary materials in handouts
